bug.author: anaxmedia
bug.description: It seems like indexing is auto-capitalizing letters after apostrophes. In the screenshot below you can see the file path folder is "Boston New Year's" with a lowercase "s" however the generated folder name is changing it to "Boston New Year'S" with an uppercase "S". <denchmark-link:https://user-images.githubusercontent.com/7167565/103031910-c7ece200-452c-11eb-9364-b326221318f1.png></denchmark-link>

comments.comment: Shouldn't happen according to our tests... Might be a frontend issue...
Are you sure this a regular ' apostrophe or might it actually be something similar like ` ?

Definitely a regular apostrophe and not a `. Read-only mode pulling from a path on my nextcloud server. I SSH'd into the files directory to confirm on there as well: "Boston New Year's" is how it appears.
